NYU Abu Dhabi Undergraduate Core Curriculum
NYU Abu Dhabi Undergraduate Core Curriculum

NYU Abu Dhabi Undergraduate Core Curriculum consists of two Core Colloquia, each of which addresses a significant global challenge from multidisciplinary perspectives, and four Core Competency Courses, one each in the four categories: Arts, Design, and Technology; Cultural Exploration and Analysis; Data and Discovery; and Structures of Thought and Society. Includes a PDF with the course descriptions.
